alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 8:19PM CST until March 05 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 69.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Monday was 70.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 70.2 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
